biography: Mikko, a golfer known for his calm demeanor on the course and strategic play, hails from the esteemed Kurk Golf club. While he might appear reserved at first glance, those who know Mikko describe him as a fierce competitor with an unwavering focus.

Having participated in the Hector Trophée once, Mikko brings a wealth of experience to the greens. Although the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his dedication to the sport remains resolute.

Currently, Mikko is not slated to participate in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. However, in the unpredictable world of golf, last-minute changes are always a possibility, leaving fans hopeful for a potential return.
